author: Safia Samee Ali
title: Local police departments prepare fail-safes for mass contagion
description: Officers are embedded in the close-knit communities they're struggling to protect while also trying to protect themselves.
content:
In Avon Lake, Ohio, on the coast of Lake Erie, a tightknit police force of 30 full-time officers looks after the city's 24,000 residents.
Every officer is crucial, especially as the coronavirus pandemic seeps through the community, which already has over 40 … [+7504 chars]
